note.p: Birth: Helensburgh, near Glasgow, Scotland (13 November 1892)
Career: Senior Research Assistant, Plant Virus Station, Cambridge
AssocMaterial: As 'Manley', CSAC 14/8/74. Papers deposited in Kenneth Smith Library, NERC Institute of Virology, Oxford
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1982 vol 28 pp 451-477, plate, by Basil Kassanis
